MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G53 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Peat Road. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8:15pm to carry out further investigations after today's fuse replacement and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:48pm on Monday, 25th January 2021
